programme.title: Ma Ekhtalafna
programme.desc: Through separate, connected episodes, the series addresses many contemporary social issues, such as corruption, unemployment, poverty, social relations, and others.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Nazeef Al Torab
programme.desc: In the town of Tal Al-Sabr, near the city of Nablus, Palestinian prisoner Bilal survives after escaping from the occupier, as his aunt Umm Askar saves him from a certain death. Bilal changes his name to Assif and the events go on.

programme.title: Ma Ekhtalafna

programme.title: Mamarr Amen
programme.desc: It focuses on the idea of unity and solidarity within the Yemeni society in order to reach a safe passage away from problems and disputes.

programme.desc: In the town of Tal Al-Sabr, near the city of Nablus, Palestinian prisoner Bilal survives after escaping from the occupier, as his aunt Umm Askar saves him from a certain death. Bilal changes his name to Assif and the events go on.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Live from Dubai, we bring you the latest global markets and analysis, plus news-making interviews, with a special focus on MEA.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Today
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. From our London HQ, Anna Edwards, Kriti Gupta and Guy Johnson break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to special guests. Ep1

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops. Ep1

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: Focusing on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policiesbeing shaped by the agenda of President Biden's administration.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick, Alix Steel and Scarlet Fu break down the day's top stories and trading action around the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policiesbeing shaped by the agenda of President Biden's administration.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week

programme.title: Leaders with Lacqua
programme.desc: Emma Grede, Good American CEO and Co-Founder. British entrepreneur Emma Grede discusses her rise to the top, how she measures success, and why diversity remains elusive in the world of fashion.

programme.title: Next Big Risk
programme.desc: Next Big Risk asks three titans of the financial industry what they see coming in the next five to ten years. With Sam Bankman-Fried, Abby Joseph Cohen, and Ken Moelis.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly

programme.title: Belle & Sebastian: The Adventure Continues
programme.desc: When his adoptive "aunt" Angelina seemingly dies in a plane crash, Sebastian refuses to believe that she is dead and embarks on a perilous trip with his dog, Belle, to find the crash site and bring Angelina home.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: After his 16-year-old daughter goes missing, and an official investigation leads nowhere, David Kim breaks into her laptop to look for clues to find her.

programme.title: Little Women

Al Washm
programme.desc: The series takes place in an old Levantine neighborhood, where it showcases the intertwined human relationships of the neighborhoods residents, and the overt and hidden conflicts that take place between them.

programme.title: Aghmed Aynayk
programme.desc: Zaid is a special needs child. Doctors diagnose his condition with being on the autism spectrum, so Munis, his mothers friend, takes care of him as he is affected by his psychological state, and tries to provide him with a stable and normal life.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Mal El Qabban
programme.desc: The events of the series take place inside Al-Hal Market in Damascus, highlighting the conditions of the Syrians, through the story of the Noman Al Zeer family and the events and problems they are exposed to.

programme.title: Al Arabji 2
programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. On the other hand, Zumuruda, who fleed from cruelty and oppression, does not know which path her fate will take her.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Arees Taht Al Talab
programme.desc: The events revolve around a group of people searching for love and marriage, and going through different circumstances. Dana creates an association for dating and reconciliation of loved ones, and the events continue.

programme.title: Al Khataya
programme.desc: Through six groups of five episodes, the work tells six stories about people who make mistakes and continue to make mistakes, but they lead them towards the abyss, and they drag other people with them.

programme.title: Yassin Abdul Malik (Ep1)

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Mwmintrol wedi'i swyno pan ddaw o hyd i ddraig go iawn, sydd y maint cywir i fod yn anifail anwes. Moomintrol is fascinated when he finds a real dragon, just the right size to be a pet.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn addurno gardd Porffor ac yn dysgu am batrymau. The Colourblocks decorate Purple's garden and learn about patterns.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na swn crawcian swnllyd yn yr ardd heddiw wrth i fwy a mwy o frogaod ymddangos yn y pwll. There are some very noisy croaking noises in the garden today as more and more frogs appear.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae trychineb yn y gegin yn golygu nad oes digon o fwyd gan Sin i fwydo pawb. All Izzy helpu? Disaster in the kitchen means there's not enough food for everyone. Can Izzy save the day?

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Rhaglen i blant lle da ni'n ymweld a gwledydd y byd i ddysgu am yr hanes, bryd, tirwedd, plant a'r diwylliant yno. Y tro hwn: trip i Kenya. This time: a trip to Kenya.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth i grwbanod mr newydd-anedig anelu am y cefnfor, mae'n rhaid i'r Octonots eu hamddiffyn rhag ysglyfaethwyr. As newborn baby sea turtles scuttle to the ocean they need help to stay safe.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Anturiaethau dau gi annwyl a drygionus sydd yn y gn draddodiadol hon. This traditional Welsh song follows two sweet and mischievous dogs on their adventures.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Bobl o hyd yn chwarae'r 'gm gopo' tan i Ffobl ymddangos a'i gopo fe, felly mae'r Olobobs yn creu Tobl sydd wrth ei fodd yn cael ei gopo! Bobble won't stop playing the 'copying game'!

programme.title: New: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ceiniog a Niwc - dau air, ond un ystyr. Lwsi sy'n edrych ar yr amrywiaeth o eiriau ni'n defnyddio mewn gwahanol ardaloedd. Lwsi looks at the variety of words we use in different areas.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar l cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: New: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Dderwen sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Dderwen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd Ysgol y Dderwen - Season 1, Episode 1
Timpo
programme.desc: Mae Maer Shim Po yn gofyn i'r tm adeiladu ffordd drwy goedwig Po, heb amharu ar unrhyw goed! Maer Shim-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest today.

programme.title: Halibalw
programme.desc: Ymunwch chriw Halibalw am raglen llawn hwyl, chwerthin, canu a dawnsio. Join the Halibalw crew for lots of fun, laughter, singing and dancing.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gair heddiw'n rhywbeth sydd i'w wneud chyfri. Tybed beth yw e a ble daw'r Abadas o hyd iddo? We're adding with the Abadas! What does today's word do, and where can it be found?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar l i Guto, Lili a Benja fynd allan i gasglu coed tn, maen nhw'n sylweddoli bod tri ysbeiliwr am ddwyn y coed. The bunnies find out that three predators are after their firewood.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Thema'r rhaglen hon yw'r 'Glust'. The theme of this programme is 'The Ear'.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Ffwffa a Bobo wrth eu bodd yn chwarae trn, ond mae eu bryd ar yrru trn stm go iawn. Ffwffa and Bobo love playing trains, but what they'd really like to do is drive the cloudy train.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'r Harbwr Feistr wedi gwneud Twt yn gyfrifol am yr Harbwr am y diwrnod. The Harbour Master has left Twt in charge for the day. Twt is very excited but will his day be a success?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau ddireidus yn ymweld 'r siop chwaraeon, ac yn llwyddo i golli'r lythyren 'r' oddi ar yr arwydd! Sblij and Sbloj visit a sports shop - and somehow manage to lose the letter 'r'!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Melyn yn cwrdd ag Oren. Dysga beth sy'n digwydd pan ti'n cymysgu Coch a Melyn. Red and Yellow meet new arrival Orange. Discover what happens when you mix red and yellow.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na sr gwib di-rif yn gwibio heibio'r roced ac mae Jangl yn ceisio eu cyfri ond yn ei gweld yn amhosib. Jangl is trying to count shooting stars. There must be an easier way!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Sin persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, ry' ni'n ymweld gwlad sy'n llawn anialwch a phethau hanesyddol - Yr Aifft. Yma, byddwn yn dysgu am yr Eifftiaid Hynafol, pyramidiau Giza, a chrefydd. We take a trip to Egypt.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Octonots rwystro dau ferdysyn mantis rhag ymladd cyn i'w crafangau cryfion chwalu'r Octofad. The Octonauts must stop two mantis shrimps fighting before they destroy the Octopad.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Taith llong o Gaernarfon i Abersoch a geir tro yma. Mae hi'n llong anarferol iawn, gan mai hwyaden yw ei chapten! A traditional Welsh song about a ship's journey from Caernarfon to Abersoch.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae creigiau enfawr yn ymddangos o gwmpas y goedwig! Giant rocks appear all over the forest!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan fydd mellt yn taro, mae'r dreigiau angen cario negeseuon yn l a 'mlaen ar y rheilffordd. When lightning strikes, it's up to the dragons to carry coded messages on the railway.
